overview: Petter M. Etholm is also an experienced entrepreneur with 20+ years in consumer retailing and franchising businesses. He was Executive Vice President of Nutri/System where he managed 250 corporate and 1000 franchise stores ($500 million in system wide sales) as well as owning and operating his own chain of 20 stores with annual turnover in excess of $10 million. Additionally, he developed over 40 stores internationally in a 2-year period. He restructured the retail operation of a matured greeting card publisher and implemented a franchising operation. He founded a wood flooring Distribution Company and a web based electricity marketplace firm.
